products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.specs: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 128GB storage
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning display, powerful performance, and ample storage for all your needs.

products.name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
products.specs: 16-inch Retina display, Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD
products.description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch offers exceptional performance and a beautiful display, making it the perfect choice for professionals.

products.name: iPad Air
products.specs: 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, 64GB storage
products.description: The iPad Air combines power and versatility, allowing you to work and play on the go.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.specs: Always-on Retina display, ECG app, heart rate monitoring
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 keeps you connected and tracks your health and fitness throughout the day.

products.name: AirPods Pro
products.specs: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, sweat and water-resistant
products.description: The AirPods Pro deliver immersive sound and a comfortable fit for a superior listening experience.

products.name: iMac 27-inch
products.specs: 27-inch Retina 5K display, 8-core Intel Core i7, 512GB SSD, Radeon Pro 5300
products.description: The iMac 27-inch offers a stunning visual experience and powerful performance for creative professionals.

products.name: Apple TV 4K
products.specs: 4K High Dynamic Range (Dolby Vision), Siri Remote, A12 Bionic chip
products.description: The Apple TV 4K brings your favorite shows and movies to life with stunning picture quality and immersive sound.

products.name: Mac mini
products.specs: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU, 8GB unified memory, 256GB SSD
products.description: The Mac mini packs powerful performance into a compact design, making it a versatile desktop solution.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.specs: 11-inch Liquid Retina display, M1 chip, 128GB storage
products.description: The iPad Pro offers desktop-class performance and a stunning display, ideal for creative professionals.

products.name: Mac Pro
products.specs: Intel Xeon W processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, AMD Radeon Pro 580X
products.description: The Mac Pro is a powerhouse for professionals who require top-tier performance and expandability.
